content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I heard that the apartment is in the city center and it is unfurnished. Considering that it is newly built, I think a fair price would be around 700 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 euros per month is quite a bit lower than what I was expecting. The location and amenities nearby definitely justify a higher price. How about we start with 950 euros per month and see if we can reach a middle ground?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more like it. Since it is an unfurnished apartment, I would expect a lower price compared to a fully furnished one. Let's meet in the middle, how about 825 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 825 euros per month is still quite a bit lower than my asking price. I'm willing to negotiate, but I must get a fair return on my investment. How about we start with 875 euros per month and see if we can find a compromise?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. Since we are talking about an unfurnished apartment, I think 850 euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 850 euros per month is closer to what I had in mind. However, I'd like to remind you of the excellent location and the new construction. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 862.50 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 860 euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I can't agree to that. The price you're offering is still not enough for the quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the property. How about 875 euros per month? That's the lowest I can go considering the location and the fact that it's a new building.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 875 euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could find a price that works for both of us. The apartment is indeed a great value, and I'm sure you'll be happy living in the city center. Is there anything else you need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I think we have covered everything. Thank you for your time and consideration, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm pleased to have you as a tenant. We'll proceed with the paperwork to finalize the agreement. Is there anything specific you would like to include in the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't have any specific requests for the lease. I trust that you will draft a fair and balanced lease agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your trust, Yi-Nuo. I'll ensure that the lease reflects the terms we've discussed. Once it's ready, I'll send you a copy for your review. Is there anything else you need assistance with regarding the move-in process?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't have any additional questions or concerns at the moment. I'll let you know if I have any questions about the lease or the move-in process.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Yi-Nuo. I'll take care of everything and make sure the transition is smooth. If you have any friends or family moving to Munich, I hope you'll consider recommending my services as a landlord. It's been a pleasure doing business with you. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
